nodes.text: The Klatooinian wikiup was the home base of a Klatooinian tribe on Sorgan around 9 ABY. Located near a village, the Klatooinians would attack a human tribe of krill farmers there, steal their krill, and take it back to the outpost to brew into spotchka. When Din Djarin and Carasynthia Dune were hired to protect the human tribe, they attacked and destroyed the Klatooinian outpost. The raiders' krill, spotchka, and other spoils littered the wikiup.

The Klatooinian wikiup first appeared in "Chapter 4: Sanctuary," the fourth episode of Jon Favreau's 2019 Disney+ series The Mandalorian. The episode was directed by Bryce Dallas Howard and released on November 29, 2019. It was subsequently identified in its StarWars.com Databank entry.
